title: Baldurs Gate 3 Wiki

Photo Mode makes its debut when Patch 8 launches. As described in Community Update #30, "Baldur’s Gate 3’s Photo Mode is a little like a photo booth that lets you set up pretty much any shot you’d like. This new feature introduces a whole slew of options to let you customise and edit your in-game photography, with various levels of freedom depending on whether you’re using it whil
